Annotation Types Summary
Email This field must be a valid email.
Equals This field must be equals to another field.
InFuture This date must be in the future.
InPast This date must be in the past.
IsTrue This field must be true.
Match This field must match the regexp.
Max This field must be lower than.
MaxSize This field size must be lower than.
Min This field must be greater than.
MinSize This field size must be lower than.
Password This field is a password.
Range This field must be lower than and greater than.
Required This field is required.
Valid This bean must satisfy all checks.
